SPELL_ABILITY.PLAY_TIME_ACTION: local player = EffectController() if player ~= nil then player:BeginNewMultipleChoice() player:AddMultipleChoiceAnswer( "CARD_QUERY_OPTION_DEAL_3_DAMAGE_TO_EACH_CREATURE" ) player:AddMultipleChoiceAnswer( "CARD_QUERY_OPTION_DEAL_3_DAMAGE_TO_EACH_PLAYER" ) player:AskMultipleChoiceQuestion( "CARD_QUERY_MC_DEAL_DAMAGE_TO_CREATURES_OR_PLAYERS" ) end
SPELL_ABILITY.FILTER: return (FilteredCard() ~= nil and FilteredCard():GetCardType():Test( CARD_TYPE_CREATURE ) ~= 0 and FilteredCard():GetZone() == ZONE_IN_PLAY) or (FilteredPlayer() ~= nil)
SPELL_ABILITY.RESOLUTION_TIME_ACTION: local decision = Object():GetMultipleChoiceResult() if (FilteredPlayer() ~= nil and decision == 1) then FilteredPlayer():DealDamage(3, Object()) elseif (FilteredCard() ~= nil and decision == 0) then FilteredCard():DealDamage(3, Object()) end
